overview: Norway is the “highest” country in Europe's north. Its landscape is featured by high hills and deep valleys shaped by the huge glaciers of the ice-age: the fjords. Although these coastal valleys are the country's main attraction, they have also been influencing the Norwegian culture for hundreds of years by providing shelter for the early settlers. From here they left to discover the North-Atlantic area and discover Iceland, Greenland and even America.
title: Norway 3D
